bibl.title: Jewellery from Late Antique Egypt.
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.note: Egyptian style: Chains from excavations at Taposiris Magna and Abuqir Bay. - Koiné style: A finger ring from Abuqir Bay. - Objects of unknown provenance. - Egyptian and koiné style combined: The jewellery from Assiût. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Yvonne Petrina, Jewellery from Late Antique Egypt.
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 21 (2014) pp. 31-43, 4 pll. n./bl. et coul.

Egyptian style: Chains from excavations at Taposiris Magna and Abuqir Bay. - Koiné style: A finger ring from Abuqir Bay. - Objects of unknown provenance. - Egyptian and koiné style combined: The jewellery from Assiût. - Avec résumé en anglais.
